SxmUiListenOnDevicesInfoComponent.HEADLINE: Set up your home device with your new subscription

APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via AppleTV
APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To Play SiriusXM on Apple TV:
APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Open the SiriusXM app on a smartphone or tablet connected to the same Wi-Fi network as the Apple TV, and allow authentication.
APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_TWO: 2. Use any web browser to enter the activation code displayed on the TV.
APPLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_THREE: 3. Use the remote to manually enter your online login.

AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via Amazon
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To Enable the SiriusXM Skill with Alexa:
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Select Settings from the Amazon Alexa app menu.
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_TWO: 2. Enable the SiriusXM Skill from the Music & Audio category.
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_FIRE_TV_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTIT: To play SiriusXM on your Amazon Fire TV device:
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_FIRE_TV_INFO_ONE: 1. Open the SXM App on a smartphone or tablet connected to the same WiFi network as the device, and allow authentication.
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_FIRE_TV_INFO_TWO: 2. Use any web browser to enter the activation code displayed on the TV.
AMAZON_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.AMAZON_FIRE_TV_INFO_THREE: 3. Use the remote to manually enter your SXM App login.

GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via Google
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To Play SiriusXM On Google Nest Devices:
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Make sure your mobile device or tablet is connected to the same Wi-Fi as your Google Nest device.
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_TWO: 2. Open the Google Home App and tap Settings.
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_THREE: 3. Under Google Assistant services, tap Radio. Select SiriusXM and link your SiriusXM account. Now ask the Google Assistant to play the SiriusXM channel you want to hear.
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.CHROMECAST_INFO_ONE: 1. Download the SXM App on your smartphone or tablet and enter your streaming credentials.
GOOGLE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.CHROMECAST_INFO_TWO: 2. Tap the cast icon and select your Chromecast device.

BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via Bose
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To play SiriusXM on Bose SoundTouch:
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1.  Download the SoundTouch® app to your smartphone or tablet, and select Add Services.
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SUB_INFO_ONE: 1. Enable the Bose skill in the Alexa app by entering your SoundTouch login, and follow the directions to discover the speaker.
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SUB_INFO_TWO: 2. Now search for and enable the SiriusXM skill in the Alexa app.
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SUB_INFO_THREE: 3. Log in with your SiriusXM username and password.
BOSE_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SUB_INFO_FOUR: 4. To start listening, say “Alexa, play [channel name or number] on SiriusXM on [name of Bose SoundTouch speaker].

ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.ROKU_PLAYER_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via Roku
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.ROKU_PLAYER_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To play SiriusXM on a Roku player:
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Select SiriusXM in the Channel Store on your Roku device.
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_TWO: 2. Select Add Channel then Go to Channel.
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.ROKU_TV_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To play SiriusXM on a Roku TV:
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.ROKU_TV_INFO_ONE: 1. Select SiriusXM in the Channel Store on your Roku device.
ROKU_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.ROKU_TV_INFO_TWO: 2. Select Add Channel then Go to Channel.

SAMSUNG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SAMSUNG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via Samsung
SAMSUNG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.SAMSUNG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To play SiriusXM on your Samsung Smart TV:
SAMSUNG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Download the SXM App from the Samsung Apps page.

LG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.LG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_TITLE: Play SiriusXM Audio and Video via LG
LG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.LG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL_SUBTITLE: To play SiriusXM on your LG Smart TV:
LG_DEVICE_SETUP_MODAL.INFO_ONE: 1. Select and open the SiriusXM app from the LG App Store.
